entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 2. Wind chill near minus 10. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 8:25 AM EDT Saturday 6 May 2023
